channel.title: How to hack AQ with Tamper Data!
channel.description:
Firstly you need Tamper Data,which you can download [url=https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/966]here[/url].
Step 1:
Open Tamper Data,but dont start tampering.
Step 2:
Go to Fairwind Spring and click on the statue until you will fight a fire/earth monster.
Step 3:
Kill the monster and when the "Next" button appears,start tampering.Click the "Next" button.
Step 4:
A pop-up should come up.Click "Submit".Then another pop-up comes up.Click "Tamper".
Step 5:
Open up Notepad and copy the ninja code(<ninja2>randomst00f</ninja2>) and paste it on Notepad.
Step 6:
Whenever you meet a monster,repeat step 4.
Step 7:
Then just replace the ninja code with the one you copied.Now the monster is turned into a treasure chest(Yay!).
And thats about it.If you didnt like this guide,then you can suck my balls.

item.title: How to hack AQ with Tamper Data!
item.dc:creator: @Kulkka Kulkka
item.description:
@Kulkka wrote:

Firstly you need Tamper Data,which you can download here.

Step 1:

Open Tamper Data,but dont start tampering.

Step 2:

Go to Fairwind Spring and click on the statue until you will fight a fire/earth monster.

Step 3:

Kill the monster and when the “Next” button appears,start tampering.Click the “Next” button.

Step 4:

A pop-up should come up.Click “Submit”.Then another pop-up comes up.Click “Tamper”.

Step 5:

Open up Notepad and copy the ninja code(randomst00f) and paste it on Notepad.

Step 6:

Whenever you meet a monster,repeat step 4.

Step 7:

Then just replace the ninja code with the one you copied.Now the monster is turned into a treasure chest(Yay!).

And thats about it.If you didnt like this guide,then you can suck my balls.
